UniqueNotificationDisplayAllowMessage: Unique notification name. Should not exceed 64 characters. Can contain Latin characters, digits, spaces, dots (.), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
MultipleEmailAddressesMustBeSeparatedByS: Multiple email addresses must be separated by a semi-colon.
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteNotificationSin: Are you sure you want to delete notification '{1}'?
AreYouSureYouWantToDeleteNotificationMul: Are you sure you want to delete {1} notifications?
NotificationWillBeSentOnSelectedEvents: Notifications are sent when the selected event occurs.
SendNotificationTo: The notification will be displayed in the Message Center, and can also be sent to:
NotificationsCannotBeSentUntilMailServer: Notifications cannot be sent until the mail server settings are defined.
NotificationMessageCanBeEdited: The notification message can be edited as required.
ChooseWhichTasksApplyRule: Choose which tasks to apply the rule to.
SummaryOfNotificationRule: A summary of the notification settings is provided below.
AtLeastOneEmailAddressIsNotValid: At least one email address is not valid.
TaskWasStarted: Task was started manually or by the Scheduler
NoChangesProcessedMoreThan: No changes were captured in the last
NoChangesToolTip: Supported with newer versions of Replicate only. Sent when no changes are captured from the source database within the specified limit. With most databases, receiving this notification will usually indicate a connectivity problem. However, with certain databases (e.g. Microsoft SQL Server, IBM DB2 for LUW, and IBM DB2 for iSeries), it could simply mean that no changes occurred within the specified limit.
ClearNotificationNoChanges: An additional notification will be sent when the task resumes processing changes.
TableProcessingSuspendedDueToErrors: Table processing suspended due to errors
TaskTableErrorLabel: Table processing was suspended due to errors
ErrorCodesInclude: Errors containing one of these codes:
ErrorCodesInfo: You can copy error codes from the Message Center and paste them into this field. Multiple error codes should be separated by a comma.
ErrorCodesRegExpError: Error codes should contain numeric values only and be separated by a comma.
TaskStoppedDueToNonRetriableError: Task stopped due to a non-recoverable error
ValueMustBeAtLeastZero: Value must be at least Zero.
ValueCannotBeDecimalNumber: Value cannot be a decimal number.
InputMaxLengthMsg: The specified input exceeds the {1} character limit.
DoYouWantSaveNotificationChangesConfirmB: Do you want to save notification changes?
ClearNotificationWarning: An additional notification will be sent when the performance/resource threshold returns to normal.
NotificationsWillOnlyBeSentIfCorrespondi: Disk Space and System Memory notifications will only be sent if the corresponding server resource control is enabled.
TestEmailDisabled_Credentials: Enter a user name and password
TestEmailDisabled_TestAddressInvalid: The field 'Send to' must be a valid email
TestEmailDisabled_TestMailIsBeingSentNow: Test mail is being sent now.
PleaseContactYourAppAdmin: Notifications cannot be sent until the mail server settings are defined by your {1} administrator.
SomeOfYourChangesAreNotValid: Some of your changes are not valid. If you close the window without first providing valid values, all of your changes will be lost.

DiskSpace.High: Disk usage reaches the high threshold
DiskSpace.Critical: Disk usage reaches the critical threshold
DiskSpace.Changed: Disk usage reaches any of the defined thresholds or returns to normal

SystemMemory.High: System memory usage reaches the high threshold
SystemMemory.Critical: System memory usage reaches the critical threshold
SystemMemory.Normal: System memory usage returns to normal
SystemMemory.Changed: System memory usage reaches any of the defined thresholds or returns to normal

SelectSpecificAssociatedTasksToRule: Select tasks to associate with the rule.
RuleAppliedAllExistingFuture: The rule will be applied to all existing and future Replicate tasks.
AssociateRuleCanOnly: Rules can only be associated with Replicate tasks.
